name: 2024 The 12th International Conference on Business, Management and Governance
content: Publication and Indexing: Submitted papers will undergo peer review by the technical program committee. Accepted papers will be published in full in the Journal of Economics, Business, and Management (JOEBM), based on the paper's topic and quality. Authors of the best conference papers will be invited to submit their papers to a special issue of Economics & Politics (SSCI, ABDC A/ABS 2). Journal of Economics, Business and Management (JOEBM) ISSN: 2301-3567 (Print), 2972-3981 (Online) DOI: 10.18178/JOEBM Abstracting/ Indexing: CNKI, Google Scholar, Electronic Journals Library, Crossref, Ulrich's Periodicals Directory, MESLibrary, etc. Economics & Politics (SSCI, ABDC A/ABS 2) Impact factor (2022):1.262/Q3 ISSN: 0954-1985 E-ISSNï¼š1468-0343 Australian Business Deans Council (ABDC A) and the Chartered Association of Business Schools (ABS AJG 2) Indexing: Social Sciences Citation Index (Clarivate Analytics), Web of Science (Clarivate Analytics), Social Science Premium Collection (ProQuest), GEOBASE (Elsevier), etc.
